svcproc.title: Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor
svcproc.para: The CMP sensor is a magnetic pickup sensor that provides the ECM with a signal that indicates camshaft position. As the cam rotates, the sensor identifies the position of the cam by locating a peg on the cam. The CMP sensor is installed in the front left side of the lower crankcase.

note.para: When ordering this sensor, make sure the sensor is the same one pictured. This sensor is used in different International Truck and Engine Corporation applications to sense crankshaft position.
